author: Reuters Editorial
title: Russia says accusations Syrian government behind gas attack false
text:
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said on Monday that allegations that the Syrian government carried out a gas attack in a besieged rebel-held town on Saturday were false and a provocation.
Russia's Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov attends a meeting with President Vladimir Putin and Chinaâ€™s top diplomat State Councillor Wang Yi at the Kremlin in Moscow, Russia April 5, 2018. Alexander Zemlianichenko/Pool via REUTERS Lavrov also told reporters following a meeting with his Tajik counterpart in Moscow that an air strike carried out on Sunday on a Syrian air base was a dangerous development.
Reporting by Maria Kiselyova; Editing by Andrew Osborn
